name: Seismik Design
description:
We are a creative studio that cater for all manner of design disciplines. Our services include: graphic design, motion graphics artists, video production, animation, web design. Nottingham, UK is our base but we are in the perfect position to serve both UK and international clients.
We believe all good design stems from good ideas and process. Our creative ideas are what makes us unique and our approach to design could just be what you are looking for.
